Organic Zucchini Blossoms

Organic Zucchini Blossoms

Fruits and Vegetables Category

Description

Organic Zucchini Blossoms are a rare and exquisite choice for chefs and home cooks alike, offering a mild and slightly sweet flavor that embodies the essence of summer. Grown on our small, family-run farms that practice sustainable agriculture, these blossoms are a testament to our dedication to eco-friendly and organic farming methods. Each blossom is carefully handpicked in the early morning to ensure they retain their delicate beauty and peak freshness. Our zucchini plants are nurtured in rich, fertile soil, free from synthetic pesticides and fertilizers, highlighting our commitment to your health and the health of the planet. These blossoms are not only perfect for stuffing and frying but also serve as an edible garnish, bringing a touch of elegance to any dish.

Specifications

  • Weight: 0.5 lb per package
  • Size: Approximately 3-4 inches in length
  • Packaging: Biodegradable cellulose film
  • Nutritional Information: Low in calories, contains vitamin C, potassium, and folate

Benefits

  • Versatile Ingredient

    Ideal for a wide range of culinary creations.

  • Sustainably Grown

    Cultivated using organic, eco-conscious methods.

  • Exceptional Flavor

    Subtle and sweet, perfect for gourmet recipes.
